channel.title: Jairo Eli de León
channel.description: Recent content on Jairo Eli de León

item.title: Site Info
item.description: This website is built with hugo. The content is Creative Commons By-SA 4.0.

item.title: Projects
item.description: The source for all of these side projects, and more, can be found on my Github profile. Design work can be found on my Behance portfolio. Colorscope An iOS app that helps you discover beautiful color schemes based on a set of harmony rules. Habit An iOS app that helps you form habit you want to count, and check-in every time you do it.
